_header: Now is the Fox driven to hole hoo to him hoo hoo
Subjects: de la Pole, William, duke of Suffolk; political poems
_description: On the arrest of the Duke of Suffolk — fifteen couplets

BLCottRollsII23.First Lines:
Now is the fox drevin to hole hoo to hym hoo hooffor and he crepe
                    out he will you all vndo…
BLCottRollsII23.Last Lines:
…And of þe perill þat may be fullBe ware dukes erles
                    and barons all
